coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.api.task

Interface TaskService


  • public interface TaskService
    A service to execute tasks.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    OpenCollab

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancelTask(String taskName)
      Cancels the task immediately, or after it finishes with the current run if it is busy.
      boolean isTaskScheduled(String taskName)
      Check if a task for the name is scheduled.
      <T> Future<T> scheduleTask(Callable<T> callable)
      Schedule a task (the callable) for execution.

      Schedule a task (the runnable) for execution.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleTask

        Future<?> scheduleTask(Runnable runnable)
        Schedule a task (the runnable) for execution.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The runnable to execute.
        Returns:
        a Future object.

      • scheduleTask

        <T> Future<T> scheduleTask(Callable<T> callable)
        Schedule a task (the callable) for execution.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a T object.
        Parameters:
        callable - The callable to execute.
        Returns:
        a Future object.

      • scheduleTaskAtFixedRate

        ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleTaskAtFixedRate(String taskName,
                                         Runnable runnable)
        Schedule the runnable for to run every schedulePeriod hours. The task is only scheduled it if the name is not already scheduled.
        Parameters:
        taskName - Some unique task name.
        runnable - The runnable to execute.
        Returns:
        a ScheduledFuture object.

      • scheduleTaskAtFixedRate

        ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleTaskAtFixedRate(String taskName,
                                         Runnable runnable,
                                         long frequencyMinutes)
        Schedule the runnable for to run every schedulePeriod hours. The task is only scheduled it if the name is not already scheduled.
        Parameters:
        taskName - Some unique task name.
        runnable - The runnable to execute.
        frequencyMinutes - a long.
        Returns:
        a ScheduledFuture object.

      • isTaskScheduled

        boolean isTaskScheduled(String taskName)
        Check if a task for the name is scheduled.
        Parameters:
        taskName - Some unique task name.
        Returns:
        true if the task for the name is already scheduled.

      • cancelTask

        void cancelTask(String taskName)
        Cancels the task immediately, or after it finishes with the current run if it is busy.
        Parameters:
        taskName - Some unique task name.
